translated: And because perfect enlightenment is the very pervader, it is not limited,

original: chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi dngos pos rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi dngos pos rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is established by the reality of all things.

original: de'i mtshams kyi yan lag rnams ni thabs te /
analyzed: de'i mtshams kyi yan lag rnams ni thabs te /
translated: The limbs of that are the means,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //
translated: the limbs of enlightenment.

original: yan lag dang / thabs dang / phyogs dang mngon par gsal bar byed pa zhes pa rnam grangs so //
analyzed: yan lag dang / thabs dang / phyogs dang mngon par gsal bar byed pa zhes pa rnam grangs so //
translated: Limb, means, aspect, and manifestation are synonyms.

original: chos rnams kyang gang las yin zhes pa ni /
analyzed: chos rnams kyang gang las yin zhes pa ni /
translated: And what are the things?

original: 'dzin par byed pa de /
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pa de /
translated: That which holds them is

original: byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa rnams kyi sems las byung ba rnam par gzhag par bya ba rnams te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa rnams kyi sems las byung ba rnam par gzhag par bya ba rnams te /
translated: the mental factors of the bodhisattvas who abide on the path,

original: dge ba'i phyogs kyis bsdus pa rnams so //
analyzed: dge ba'i phyogs kyis bsdus pa rnams so //
translated: those included in the category of virtue.

original: zag pa med pa nyid kyi phyir lam gyi bden pa ni mtha' gcig tu dge ba'i phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med pa nyid kyi phyir lam gyi bden pa ni mtha' gcig tu dge ba'i phyir /
translated: The truth of the path is virtuous in the sense of being the means to the uncontaminated, because it is exclusively virtuous.

original: lam gyi dbye ba las dge ba ste /
analyzed: lam gyi dbye ba las dge ba ste /
translated: Virtue is in the sense of the classification of the path.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa'i sgrub pa po de las ltos nas so //
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'i sgrub pa po de las ltos nas so //
translated: in relation to the practitioner who is still subject to regression.

original: lam lnga po rnams ni /
analyzed: lam lnga po rnams ni /
translated: The five paths

original: gnyis dag gis bsdus par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: gnyis dag gis bsdus par rig par bya ste /
translated: should be understood as being included in two.

original: gnyis po gang dag gis she na 'jig rten pa'i lam dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis so //
analyzed: gnyis po gang dag gis she na 'jig rten pa'i lam dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis so //
translated: In relation to which two? In relation to the mundane path and the supramundane path.

original: de la 'jig rten pa'i lam gyi chos rnams gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten pa'i lam gyi chos rnams gang zhe na /
translated: What are the dharmas of the mundane path?

original: chos nyi shu rtsa gnyis po rnams so //
analyzed: chos nyi shu rtsa gnyis po rnams so //
translated: They are the twenty-two dharmas.

original: gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhe na /
translated: What are they?

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par @330b spang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs su brjod pa rnams so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par @330b spang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs su brjod pa rnams so //
translated: They are the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four bases of supernatural power, the five faculties, and the five powers.

original: de la 'jig rten las las 'das pa'i lam gyi chos rnams gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'jig rten las las 'das pa'i lam gyi chos rnams gang zhe na /
translated: What are the dharmas of the supramundane path?

original: bco lnga rnams so //
analyzed: bco lnga rnams so //
translated: They are the fifteen.

original: gang zhe na byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po rnams so //
analyzed: gang zhe na byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po rnams so //
translated: What are they? They are the seven factors of awakening and the eightfold noble path.

original: de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four establishments of mindfulness?

original: smras pa / lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so //
analyzed: smras pa / lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so //
translated: He said: The application of mindfulness to the body, the application of mindfulness to feeling, the application of mindfulness to mind, and the application of mindfulness to phenomena.

original: de la lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: de la lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /
translated: Here, the application of mindfulness to the body is as follows.

original: 'dir thams cad kyis thams cad du /
analyzed: 'dir thams cad kyis thams cad du /
translated: Here, by all means,

original: rang dang gzhan gyi lus 'di ni ji srid du rgyun gyis 'jug pa na khams gsum por gang zhig snang ba de nyid /
analyzed: rang dang gzhan gyi lus 'di ni ji srid du rgyun gyis 'jug pa na khams gsum por gang zhig snang ba de nyid /
translated: this body of self and other is not one, to the extent that it appears in the three realms while it is engaged in a continuum.

original: de rab tu rnam par spyod bzhin pa de srid du gcig par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de rab tu rnam par spyod bzhin pa de srid du gcig par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: To the extent that it is thoroughly investigated, it is not one,🔽because a whole is not established.

original: cha shas can ma grub pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de ma grub pa yang /
analyzed: cha shas can ma grub pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de ma grub pa yang /
translated: And it is not established because

original: smin pa dang / ma smin pa dang / dmar ba dang / dmar ba ma yin pa la sogs pa la skyon mthong ba nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: smin pa dang / ma smin pa dang / dmar ba dang / dmar ba ma yin pa la sogs pa la skyon mthong ba nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: it is seen to be flawed in terms of ripened and unripened, red and not red, and so on.

original: gcig nyid grub pa las /
analyzed: gcig nyid grub pa las /
translated: Since one is not established,

original: du ma nyid du ma skyes pa'i rdul phra rab tu dbye bar bya bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: du ma nyid du ma skyes pa'i rdul phra rab tu dbye bar bya bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: because it is divisible into many parts, like a subtle particle that is not born as a multiplicity.

original: tshogs pa ma skyes pa'am /
analyzed: tshogs pa ma skyes pa'am /
translated: The collection is not born,

original: de mngon par rtogs na sna tshogs pa rdul phra rab tu ltung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de mngon par rtogs na sna tshogs pa rdul phra rab tu ltung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because when it is realized, the multiplicity falls into the subtle particle.

original: de'i phyir gnyi ga'i chos dang bral ba nyid las lus 'di ni stong pa'o zhes bya bar rjes su dran pa gang yin pa de'i nye zhing nye bar sems kyi gnas pa ni lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnyi ga'i chos dang bral ba nyid las lus 'di ni stong pa'o zhes bya bar rjes su dran pa gang yin pa de'i nye zhing nye bar sems kyi gnas pa ni lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the body is empty because it is devoid of both natures. The close placement of mindfulness is the close placement of the mind on that mindfulness.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: Similarly,

original: bde ba la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can gyi chor ba rnams kyang /🔽rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug la brten pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can gyi chor ba rnams kyang / rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug la brten pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: the feelings that have the nature of pleasure, etc.,

original: rnam pa bco brgyad de /
analyzed: rnam pa bco brgyad de /
translated: are of eighteen kinds because they are based on the six collections of consciousness.🔽They are not established as past, etc., when distinguished as pleasure, etc.,

original: de bde yang bde bde ba la sogs pa rnams 'das pa la sogs par phye na ma grub pa'i phyir stong pa'o zhes dran pa'i rang gi sems nye bar gnas pa ni /
analyzed: de bde yang bde bde ba la sogs pa rnams 'das pa la sogs par phye na ma grub pa'i phyir stong pa'o zhes dran pa'i rang gi sems nye bar gnas pa ni /
translated: therefore, the close placement of mindfulness is the close placement of the mind on the emptiness of those feelings.

original: tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the application of mindfulness to feelings.

original: shes bya de lta bu yin pa'i phyir na sems dang / snga ma dang phyi ma dang lhan cig tu byung ba nyid du ma grub pa'i stong pa nyid do zhes dran pa gang yin pa'i nye bar gnas pa ni sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no //🔽de bzhin du dge ba dang mi dge ba dang @331a * //
analyzed: shes bya de lta bu yin pa'i phyir na sems dang / snga ma dang phyi ma dang lhan cig tu byung ba nyid du ma grub pa'i stong pa nyid do zhes dran pa gang yin pa'i nye bar gnas pa ni sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin no // de bzhin du dge ba dang mi dge ba dang @331a * //
translated: The application of mindfulness to mind is the application of mindfulness that is the abiding of mindfulness in the emptiness of mind, which is not established as prior, subsequent, or simultaneous, because the object of cognition is like that.🔽Similarly, the application of mindfulness to phenomena is the abiding of mindfulness in the emptiness of phenomena, which are classified as virtuous, nonvirtuous,

original: lung du ma bstan pa la sogs pa'i phye ba'i chos rnams snga ma bzhin du stong pa nyid las dran pa'i gnas pa gad yin pa ni chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ste /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa la sogs pa'i phye ba'i chos rnams snga ma bzhin du stong pa nyid las dran pa'i gnas pa gad yin pa ni chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ste /
translated: neutral, and so on, because phenomena are empty of themselves, as before.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i lam mo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i lam mo //
translated: This is the bodhisattva path.

original: gang gi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: khams gsum po ni lnga'i bdag nyid de /
analyzed: khams gsum po ni lnga'i bdag nyid de /
translated: The three realms are of the nature of the five aggregates.

original: de la lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pas gzugs kyi phung po'i yang dag par rjes su khong du chud pa las /
analyzed: de la lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pas gzugs kyi phung po'i yang dag par rjes su khong du chud pa las /
translated: Among them, the application of mindfulness to the body is the full understanding of the aggregate of form.

original: bar ma gnyis pos /
analyzed: bar ma gnyis pos /
translated: The two middle applications of mindfulness

original: tshor ba dang rnam par shes pa gnyis dag gi mtha' las 'du shes dang 'du byed dag ste /
analyzed: tshor ba dang rnam par shes pa gnyis dag gi mtha' las 'du shes dang 'du byed dag ste /
translated: The extremes of feeling and consciousness are perception and volitional formations.

original: chos kyi sgras thun mong ba snod kyi 'jig rten no //🔽nyan thos kyi lta ba la ni rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / gtsang ba dang / bdag dang bcas pa'i phyin ci log bzhi'i gnyen por /
analyzed: chos kyi sgras thun mong ba snod kyi 'jig rten no // nyan thos kyi lta ba la ni rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / gtsang ba dang / bdag dang bcas pa'i phyin ci log bzhi'i gnyen por /
translated: The word “phenomenon” refers to the common environment.🔽In the śrāvaka view, the applications of mindfulness of impermanence, suffering, impurity, and no-self are the antidotes to the four errors of permanence, happiness, purity, and self.

original: mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / mi gtsang ba dang / bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so zhes pa ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / mi gtsang ba dang / bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so zhes pa ni khyad par ro //
translated: This is the difference.

original: sngags kyi lta ba la ni rang rig pa'i rang bzhin gyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni lus la sogs pa rnams te /
analyzed: sngags kyi lta ba la ni rang rig pa'i rang bzhin gyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni lus la sogs pa rnams te /
translated: In the mantra view, the ḍākinīs of the nature of self-awareness are the body and so forth.

original: chos nyid kyi gzugs su shes par bya'o //
analyzed: chos nyid kyi gzugs su shes par bya'o //
translated: They should be known as the form of reality.

original: de'i don ni /
analyzed: de'i don ni /
translated: The meaning of that is

original: lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs so //
analyzed: lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs so //
translated: stated by “The application of mindfulness of the body is the ḍākinī,” and so forth.

original: de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni du zhig ces kha cig dogs pas /
analyzed: de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni du zhig ces kha cig dogs pas /
translated: Some doubt whether there are four bases of supernatural power.

original: smras pa / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni bzhi yin te /
analyzed: smras pa / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni bzhi yin te /
translated: The bases of supernatural power are four.

original: 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
analyzed: 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
translated: They are the base of supernatural power that is will, the base of supernatural power that is the mind, the base of supernatural power that is energy, and the base of supernatural power that is investigation.

original: de la 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la sogs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la sogs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the base of supernatural power that is will?

original: 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
analyzed: 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
translated: It is the base of supernatural power that is the concentration of will, the concentration of energy, the concentration of mind, and the concentration of investigation, which is endowed with the equipment of the faculties, the equipment of the powers, and the equipment of the path.

original: sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
analyzed: sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
translated: the basis of supernatural power that is concentration of mind accompanied by the volition of striving.

original: mdo 'di rnams kyi don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: mdo 'di rnams kyi don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of these sūtras is as follows.

original: 'dir ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi skyon drug nyid du 'gyur ba 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'dir ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi skyon drug nyid du 'gyur ba 'di lta ste /
translated: Here, the faults of all concentrations are just six:

original: le lo dang / dmigs pa brjed pa dang / bying ba dang / rgod pa dang / 'du mi byed pa dang / 'du byed @331b pa'o //
analyzed: le lo dang / dmigs pa brjed pa dang / bying ba dang / rgod pa dang / 'du mi byed pa dang / 'du byed @331b pa'o //
translated: laziness, forgetting the object of meditation, laxity and excitement, lack of application, and application.

original: 'di las bying ba dang / rgod pa gcig tu byas nas skyon ldar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di las bying ba dang / rgod pa gcig tu byas nas skyon ldar 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, laxity and excitement are counted as one fault.

original: de rnams spong ba'i 'du byed brgyad do //
analyzed: de rnams spong ba'i 'du byed brgyad do //
translated: There are eight applications that eliminate those.

original: brgyad gang zhe na /
analyzed: brgyad gang zhe na /
translated: What are the eight?

original: dad pa dang / 'dun pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / shin tu sbyangs pa ste bzhi dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / sems pa dang / btang snyoms te brgyad do //
analyzed: dad pa dang / 'dun pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / shin tu sbyangs pa ste bzhi dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / sems pa dang / btang snyoms te brgyad do //
translated: They are four: faith, aspiration, effort, and pliancy; and four: mindfulness, vigilance, volition, and equanimity.

original: de la dang po ni le lo'i gnyen po ste /
analyzed: de la dang po ni le lo'i gnyen po ste /
translated: Among them, the first is the antidote to laziness.

original: dad pa ni dge ba'i las la rab tu 'jug go //
analyzed: dad pa ni dge ba'i las la rab tu 'jug go //
translated: Faith is the entry to virtue.

original: 'dun pa ni de'i bsam pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dun pa ni de'i bsam pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pa nyid do //
translated: Will-power is the desire to remain in that state of mind.

original: brtson 'grus kyis ni le lo spong ngo //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyis ni le lo spong ngo //
translated: Exertion is the elimination of laziness.

original: shin tu sbyangs pas spong ba mngon sum du byas pa'i bya ba de nyid ni 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: shin tu sbyangs pas spong ba mngon sum du byas pa'i bya ba de nyid ni 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par brjod par bya'o //
translated: The very same action of eliminating laziness is called the basis of psychic power of will-power.

original: dran pas ni dmigs pa brjed pa spong bar byed la /
analyzed: dran pas ni dmigs pa brjed pa spong bar byed la /
translated: Mindfulness is the elimination of forgetfulness of the meditative object.

original: shes bzhin gyis ni bying ba dang rgod pa ste /
analyzed: shes bzhin gyis ni bying ba dang rgod pa ste /
translated: Awareness is the elimination of laxity and excitedness.

original: 'di dag ni brtson 'grus dang dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dag go //
analyzed: 'di dag ni brtson 'grus dang dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dag go //
translated: These two are the basis of psychic power of exertion and of investigation.

original: gang gi cho sems dang btang snyoms dag gis gang zhig 'bad pas spong ba de ni sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi cho sems dang btang snyoms dag gis gang zhig 'bad pas spong ba de ni sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par brjod par bya'o //
translated: The basis of psychic power of mind is that by which one strives to eliminate laxity and excitedness with the mind and with equanimity.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de dag ni brtson 'grus bzhir brjod bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de dag ni brtson 'grus bzhir brjod bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, they are called the four bases of psychic power.

original: de nyid ting nge 'dzin rgyal po'i mdor gsungs te /🔽dben pa la gnas pa /
analyzed: de nyid ting nge 'dzin rgyal po'i mdor gsungs te / dben pa la gnas pa /
translated: The same is stated in the Samadhiraja-sutra:🔽Dwelling in solitude,

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa /
translated: dwelling in freedom from attachment,

original: 'gog pa la gnas pa /
analyzed: 'gog pa la gnas pa /
translated: It is based on cessation.

original: rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba /
analyzed: rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba /
translated: It is transformed by the abandonment of the defilements.🔽It is the abandonment of substance, because it is free from the application to the object of the conditioned.

original: 'dus byas kyi dmigs pa la sbyor ba dang bral ba'i phyir rdzas spong ba de ni spong ba dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zhes pa ste /
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi dmigs pa la sbyor ba dang bral ba'i phyir rdzas spong ba de ni spong ba dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zhes pa ste /
translated: This is the basis of supernormal power that is associated with abandonment.

original: yan lag lnga po bsdu bar byas na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po ni rnam pa nyi shu rnams so //🔽rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: yan lag lnga po bsdu bar byas na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po ni rnam pa nyi shu rnams so // rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: When the five members are combined, the four bases of supernormal power are twenty in number.🔽What is supernormal power?🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.

original: 'phel ba ni rdzu 'phrul te /🔽ri dh'u 'phel ba la'o zhes pa'i byings s'a r'a ya na las 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'phel ba ni rdzu 'phrul te / ri dh'u 'phel ba la'o zhes pa'i byings s'a r'a ya na las 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.

original: de la stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gang yin pa thams cad nyid 'phel bar byed cing 'thob par byed pa de ni rdzu 'phrul te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽de'i rkang pa lta bu yin pa'i phyir rkang pa ste /
analyzed: de la stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gang yin pa thams cad nyid 'phel bar byed cing 'thob par byed pa de ni rdzu 'phrul te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //🔽de'i rkang pa lta bu yin pa'i phyir rkang pa ste /
translated: It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.🔽It is the increase of the mind of supernormal power.

original: thob par byed pa la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
analyzed: thob par byed pa la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
translated: The bases of psychic power are for the attainment of the superknowledges.

original: thun mong pa yin yang lam gyi thabs nyid de /
analyzed: thun mong pa yin yang lam gyi thabs nyid de /
translated: Even though they are common to both, they are the method of the path.

original: 'di kho na'i rkang pa gnyis nyid ni ting nge 'dzin gyi skyon gyi gnyen po shin tu ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di kho na'i rkang pa gnyis nyid ni ting nge 'dzin gyi skyon gyi gnyen po shin tu ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Only these two are the bases of the superknowledges, because they are the antidotes to the faults of concentration.

original: @332a * // 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin ni rab gtum ma dang / gtum mig ma dang / 'od ldan ma dang / sna chen ma ste thugs kyi 'khor lo'i gnas kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams so //
analyzed: @332a * // 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin ni rab gtum ma dang / gtum mig ma dang / 'od ldan ma dang / sna chen ma ste thugs kyi 'khor lo'i gnas kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams so //
translated: Their nature is that of the dakinis of the mind wheel, namely, Caṇḍālī, Caṇḍākṣī, Māmakī, and Pukkāsī.

original: de la dbang po rnams ni du zhe na /
analyzed: de la dbang po rnams ni du zhe na /
translated: How many faculties are there?🔽There are five.

original: lnga'o // lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga'o // lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five?

original: dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab po //
analyzed: dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab po //
translated: Faith, vigor, mindfulness, concentration, and wisdom.

original: de la sbyor ba'i lam du nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i chos bzhi po dro bar gyur pa dang / rtse mor gyur pa dang / bzod par gyur pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog rnams so //
analyzed: de la sbyor ba'i lam du nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i chos bzhi po dro bar gyur pa dang / rtse mor gyur pa dang / bzod par gyur pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog rnams so //
translated: The path of application is the four factors conducive to insight, namely, heat, summit, acceptance, and the supreme mundane state.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' zag pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mngon du phyogs par byas pas me'i snga ltas su dro bar 'byung ba ltar /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' zag pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mngon du phyogs par byas pas me'i snga ltas su dro bar 'byung ba ltar /
translated: The bodhisattva who has directed himself toward the uncontaminated concentrations is like the appearance of heat as a sign of the imminence of fire.

original: sems las ye shes kyi me skye ba de ni dro bar gyur par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sems las ye shes kyi me skye ba de ni dro bar gyur par brjod par bya'o //
translated: The arising of the fire of transcendent knowledge from the mind is called heat.

original: de nyid shin tu ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pa ni rtse mo'o //
analyzed: de nyid shin tu ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pa ni rtse mo'o //
translated: That very transcendent knowledge, together with the extremely pure superior intention, is the peak.

original: de nyid sems su bzod par byed pa'i bdag nyid ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid sems su bzod par byed pa'i bdag nyid ni bzod pa'o //
translated: That very transcendent knowledge, in the nature of the forbearance of the mind, is forbearance.

original: de nyid bzod pa'i de ma thag tu 'byung ba ni 'jig rten chos mchog ste /
analyzed: de nyid bzod pa'i de ma thag tu 'byung ba ni 'jig rten chos mchog ste /
translated: That very transcendent knowledge, which arises immediately after forbearance, is the supreme mundane state.

original: nye bar spyod pa las 'di ni sbyor ba dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar spyod pa las 'di ni sbyor ba dang bcas pa'o //
translated: This is the supreme mundane state together with its preparation.

original: de la nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang po dag tu dad pa la sogs pa de rnams dbang po lngar brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de la nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang po dag tu dad pa la sogs pa de rnams dbang po lngar brjod par bya'o //
translated: In the first of these stages of the factors conducive to penetrative insight, faith and so on are called the five faculties.

original: de la dad pa ni yod pa nyid dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam dang / bden pa dang dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa la sems kyi yid ches pa de ni dad pa'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: de la dad pa ni yod pa nyid dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam dang / bden pa dang dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa la sems kyi yid ches pa de ni dad pa'i dbang po'o //
translated: Faith is the faculty of faith. It is the mind's firm conviction in the existence of the supramundane path, in the Truths, in the Three Jewels, etc.

original: dad pa'i dbang pos bskyed pa'i chos rnams la 'bad par byed pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o //
analyzed: dad pa'i dbang pos bskyed pa'i chos rnams la 'bad par byed pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o //
translated: The faculty of vigor is the effort to produce the dharmas of faith, etc.

original: de yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: It is of four kinds:

original: sngon du 'gro ba'i brtson 'grus dang / mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / so sor rtog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: sngon du 'gro ba'i brtson 'grus dang / mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / so sor rtog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus so //
translated: vigor as preliminary effort, vigor as non-retrogressing, vigor as non-demoralization, and vigor as non-distraction.

original: brtson 'grus kyis bskyed pa'i chos rnams la yang dang yang du sngon du phyogs par byas nas brjod pa med pa de ni dran pa'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyis bskyed pa'i chos rnams la yang dang yang du sngon du phyogs par byas nas brjod pa med pa de ni dran pa'i dbang po'o //
translated: The faculty of mindfulness is the repeated orientation of the mind to the dharmas produced by vigor.

original: dran pa'i dbang pos bskyed pa'i chos rnams yid la byed pa ni tha snyad gzhan thams cad yongs su dor nas gnas par byed pa de ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o //
analyzed: dran pa'i dbang pos bskyed pa'i chos rnams yid la byed pa ni tha snyad gzhan thams cad yongs su dor nas gnas par byed pa de ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o //
translated: The faculty of mindfulness is the attention to the things produced by the faculty of concentration. It is the state of being free from all other discursive thoughts.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos bskyed pa'i chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog cing rnam par dpyod par @332b byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos bskyed pa'i chos rnams la yang dag par so sor rtog cing rnam par dpyod par @332b byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o //
translated: The faculty of wisdom is the discernment and investigation of the things produced by the faculty of concentration.

original: ci'i phyir dbang po zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir dbang po zhes bya zhe na /
translated: Why are they called faculties?

original: dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir dbang po ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir dbang po ste /
translated: Because they are the origin of the wholesome things.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i phung po lnga rnams kyi shin tu skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i phung po lnga rnams kyi shin tu skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: They are the origin of the five aggregates of defilement and purification.

original: shes rab kyi dbang po dor nas dpa' bo'i blo can ma dang / mi'u thung ma dang / langka'i dbang phyug ma dang / shing grim ma ste mkha' 'gro ma bzhi rnams ni dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams rnam par dag par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi dbang po dor nas dpa' bo'i blo can ma dang / mi'u thung ma dang / langka'i dbang phyug ma dang / shing grim ma ste mkha' 'gro ma bzhi rnams ni dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams rnam par dag par shes par bya'o //
translated: The four dakinis, the Heroine of the Mind, the Dwarf, the Lady of Lanka, and the Tree Feller, should be known as the purities of faith, perseverance, mindfulness, and samadhi.

original: de la stobs rnams ni du zhe na /
analyzed: de la stobs rnams ni du zhe na /
translated: How many powers are there?🔽Five.

original: lnga'o // lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga'o // lnga gang zhe na /
translated: Which five?

original: sngar bshad pa'i dad pa la sogs pa rnams kho na'o //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i dad pa la sogs pa rnams kho na'o //
translated: Faith and so on, as previously explained.

original: dbang po dang stobs la sogs pa rnams kyi byed pa tha dad pa yin nam ci zhe na /
analyzed: dbang po dang stobs la sogs pa rnams kyi byed pa tha dad pa yin nam ci zhe na /
translated: Are the functions of the faculties and the powers different?

original: smras pa / gang gi tshe dad pa la sogs pa rnam par 'gyur ba de ni /
analyzed: smras pa / gang gi tshe dad pa la sogs pa rnam par 'gyur ba de ni /
translated: It is said: When faith and so on are weak, they are called faculties.

original: dbang po'i zol la brten nas 'gyur te /
analyzed: dbang po'i zol la brten nas 'gyur te /
translated: When they are strong, they are called powers.

original: gang gi tshe mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma dad pa dang / le lo dang / brjed ngas pa dang / rnam par g-yengs shing skye ba'i gnas yid la byed pa dang / shes rab 'chal bas mi brdzi ba ni stobs su 'gyur ro zhes pas byed pa tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma dad pa dang / le lo dang / brjed ngas pa dang / rnam par g-yengs shing skye ba'i gnas yid la byed pa dang / shes rab 'chal bas mi brdzi ba ni stobs su 'gyur ro zhes pas byed pa tha dad pa'o //
translated: When it is not overcome by its opposites, i.e., lack of faith, laziness, forgetfulness, distraction, the attention to the origin of ideas, and stupidity, then it is a power.

original: sngar gsungs pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po dang bcas gsung gi 'khor lo'i sa srung ma dang / 'jigs byed chen po dang / rlung shugs ma dang / chang 'thung ma dang / lha mo sngo bsangs ma dang / shin tu bzang mo rnams rnam par dag par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sngar gsungs pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po dang bcas gsung gi 'khor lo'i sa srung ma dang / 'jigs byed chen po dang / rlung shugs ma dang / chang 'thung ma dang / lha mo sngo bsangs ma dang / shin tu bzang mo rnams rnam par dag par shes par bya'o //
translated: The faculty of wisdom, which was mentioned earlier, and the stages of the wheel of the teachings, namely, Locanā, Māmakī, Pāṇḍaravāsinī, Tārā, and Vairocanī, should be understood as being purified by the five powers.

original: de la byang chub kyi yan lag ni du zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub kyi yan lag ni du zhe na /
translated: How many members of enlightenment are there?

original: bdun no // bdun gang zhe na /
analyzed: bdun no // bdun gang zhe na /
translated: Seven. Which seven?

original: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
translated: the factor of perfect awakening that is the investigation of phenomena,🔽the factor of perfect awakening that is mindfulness,

original: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: and the factor of perfect awakening that is equanimity.

original: yan lag 'di rnams ni mthong ba'i lam du byang chub kyi yin te /
analyzed: yan lag 'di rnams ni mthong ba'i lam du byang chub kyi yin te /
translated: These factors are factors of awakening on the path of seeing.

original: sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes ni byang chub bo //
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes ni byang chub bo //
translated: Awakening is the wisdom that is free from obscurations.🔽The factor of perfect awakening that is meditative absorption is the meditative absorption of the mind that sees the truth.

original: gang gis bden pa mthong ba'i sems la ting nge 'dzin du byed pa de ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //🔽gang @333a * //
analyzed: gang gis bden pa mthong ba'i sems la ting nge 'dzin du byed pa de ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //🔽gang @333a * //
translated: The factor of perfect awakening that is effort is the effort to see the truth.🔽The factor of perfect awakening that is joy is the joy of the mind that sees the truth.🔽The factor of perfect awakening that is pliancy is the pliancy of the mind that sees the truth.🔽The factor of perfect awakening that is the investigation of phenomena is the investigation of phenomena by the mind that sees the truth.🔽The factor of perfect awakening that is mindfulness is the mindfulness of the mind that sees the truth.🔽The factor of perfect awakening that is equanimity is the equanimity of the mind that sees the truth.

original: gis de kho na la 'bad par byed pa de ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: gis de kho na la 'bad par byed pa de ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: The effort to strive for that reality is the limb of correct effort.

original: gang du de kho na la the tshom med pa'i sems su byed pa de ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: gang du de kho na la the tshom med pa'i sems su byed pa de ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: The mind that is free from doubt about that reality is the limb of correct joy.

original: dga' ba de nyid kyis lus dang ngag dang sems dang las la dbang ba las nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sbangs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dga' ba de nyid kyis lus dang ngag dang sems dang las la dbang ba las nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sbangs pa'i phyir /
translated: By that joy, the body, speech, mind, and action are empowered. The cooling of the torment of the afflictions is

original: shin tu bsil ba thob pa de ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: shin tu bsil ba thob pa de ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: the attainment of complete coolness, which is the limb of correct pliancy.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i dngos po'i rang bzhin yongs su shes pa de ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i dngos po'i rang bzhin yongs su shes pa de ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: The complete knowledge of the nature of reality is the limb of correct analysis of phenomena.

original: de nyid la sems kyi brjed pa med pa ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: de nyid la sems kyi brjed pa med pa ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: The non-forgetfulness of that reality is the limb of correct mindfulness.

original: ting nge 'dzin la mi bzod pa dang / zhen pa med pa dor ba de ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la mi bzod pa dang / zhen pa med pa dor ba de ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: The limb of enlightenment that is equanimity is the rejection of impatience with meditative concentration and of attachment.

original: 'di rnams kyi nang nas ting nge 'dzin dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin ni /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi nang nas ting nge 'dzin dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin ni /
translated: Among these, the limb of enlightenment that is meditative concentration and the limb of enlightenment that is effort have the nature of

original: rta rna ma dang / mkha' 'gro gdong mar shes par bya'o zhes pa gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' mo rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: rta rna ma dang / mkha' 'gro gdong mar shes par bya'o zhes pa gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' mo rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Hayakarṇī and Dākinīmukha, respectively. This is the purity of the heroines of the wheel of speech.

original: dga' ba la sogs pa lhag ma lnga rnams kyi ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma dang / khanda ro hi dang / chang 'tshong ma dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma dang / shin tu dpa' mo'i rnams rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ba la sogs pa lhag ma lnga rnams kyi ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma dang / khanda ro hi dang / chang 'tshong ma dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma dang / shin tu dpa' mo'i rnams rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The remaining five, beginning with joy, have the purity of Cakravegā, Khaṇḍarohā, Māyūrī, Cakravīrā, and Surasā, respectively.

original: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po mthong ba'i lam gsungs nas /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po mthong ba'i lam gsungs nas /
translated: Having taught the path of seeing, which is the antidote to the afflictive obstructions,

original: shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po sgom pa'i lam gsungs te /
analyzed: shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po sgom pa'i lam gsungs te /
translated: he teaches the path of meditation, which is the antidote to the obstructions to omniscience.

original: de yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad do //
analyzed: de yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad do //
translated: That is the eightfold noble path.

original: brgyad gang zhe na /
analyzed: brgyad gang zhe na /
translated: What are the eight?

original: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
translated: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness,

original: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
translated: and right concentration.

original: de la sgom pa'i lam du shes bya'i sgrib pa rang bzhin med pa'o zhes pa'i blo gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i lta ba ste /
analyzed: de la sgom pa'i lam du shes bya'i sgrib pa rang bzhin med pa'o zhes pa'i blo gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i lta ba ste /
translated: Among them, right view is the awareness that the obscurations to knowledge on the path of meditation do not intrinsically exist.

original: 'jig rten pha rol yod pa nyid du lta ba yang yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol yod pa nyid du lta ba yang yin no //
translated: It is also the view that there is a world beyond.

original: lta ba de rnyed nas kyang bdag med pa la dmigs pa ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa'o //
analyzed: lta ba de rnyed nas kyang bdag med pa la dmigs pa ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa'o //
translated: Having attained that view, right thought is the focus on selflessness.

original: rang gis mthong ba'i don sems can rnams la rab tu gsal bar ston pa ni @333b yang dag pa'i ngag go //
analyzed: rang gis mthong ba'i don sems can rnams la rab tu gsal bar ston pa ni @333b yang dag pa'i ngag go //
translated: Right speech is the clear teaching to sentient beings of the meaning that one has seen.

original: mtha' gcig tu dge ba ni lus kyi las kyi mtha' yin la /
analyzed: mtha' gcig tu dge ba ni lus kyi las kyi mtha' yin la /
translated: Right action is the virtuous activity of the body.

original: rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa rnams kyis 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir du pha rol skrag par byed pa yang yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa rnams kyis 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir du pha rol skrag par byed pa yang yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'o //
translated: The right action is to frighten others in order to discipline them through miracles and so forth.

original: bsam gtan gyi kha zas tsam dang chos gos la sogs pa tshol ba gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi kha zas tsam dang chos gos la sogs pa tshol ba gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o //
translated: The right livelihood is to seek only the food and clothing of meditation and the Dharma robes and so forth.

original: spyod lam thams cad du rang gi sems dang lus dang ngag dang sems kyi tha snyad dang mthun par sbyor ba ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'o //
analyzed: spyod lam thams cad du rang gi sems dang lus dang ngag dang sems kyi tha snyad dang mthun par sbyor ba ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'o //
translated: The right effort is to apply oneself in all activities in accordance with one’s mind, body, speech, and conventional reality.

original: yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang gsungs pa /
translated: It is also said:

original: spyod pa la zhugs rgyal sras dbang po yi //
analyzed: spyod pa la zhugs rgyal sras dbang po yi //
translated: The bodhisattva who has entered the conduct

original: yul du sna tshogs ji lta ji ltar 'jug /
analyzed: yul du sna tshogs ji lta ji ltar 'jug /
translated: whatever various objects the senses engage

original: de lta de ltar rig pa mthu tshig gis //
analyzed: de lta de ltar rig pa mthu tshig gis //
translated: through the power of knowledge and words

original: sems can phan phyir mngon par 'du byed do //
analyzed: sems can phan phyir mngon par 'du byed do //
translated: manifests for the benefit of sentient beings.

original: zhes so // sgom pa'i lam du dmigs pa ma brjed pa ni yang dag pa'i dran pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // sgom pa'i lam du dmigs pa ma brjed pa ni yang dag pa'i dran pa'o //
translated: On the path of meditation, the right mindfulness is not to forget the object.

original: der rtse gcig pa'i sems ma g-yos pa rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te ;
analyzed: der rtse gcig pa'i sems ma g-yos pa rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te ;
translated: The characteristic of the vajra-like concentration, the unwavering one-pointed mind, is right concentration,

original: kun du 'od kyi sa'i bar du gsal bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: kun du 'od kyi sa'i bar du gsal bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: which becomes clear up to the stage of Universal Radiance.

original: de la dang po gsum gyis ni //
analyzed: de la dang po gsum gyis ni //
translated: Among them, the first three

original: stobs chen ma dang / 'khor los sgyur ma dang / brtson 'grus chen mo rnams rnam par dag pa'o zhes sku'i 'khor lo'i rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: stobs chen ma dang / 'khor los sgyur ma dang / brtson 'grus chen mo rnams rnam par dag pa'o zhes sku'i 'khor lo'i rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: are the purities of Mahābalā, Cakravarmiṇī, and Mahāvīryā, which is the purity of the wheel of body.

original: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni khva gdong ma dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni 'ug gdong ma'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni khva gdong ma dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni 'ug gdong ma'o //
translated: Right action is Kākāsyā, and right livelihood is Uḍupādhyāyī.

original: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni khyi gdong ma'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni khyi gdong ma'o //
translated: Right effort is Śvānoḍupādhyāyī.

original: yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag gdong ma'o zhes pa ni sgo skyong ma rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag gdong ma'o zhes pa ni sgo skyong ma rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Right mindfulness is Sūkarṇoḍupādhyāyī, which is the purity of the gate protectors.

original: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka rdo rje ste ye shes kyi padma'i lte ba rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka rdo rje ste ye shes kyi padma'i lte ba rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Right concentration is the Blessed One Śrī Heruka Vajra, the purity of the center of the lotus of gnosis.

original: dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyes pa'i phyir la sogs pa ni gshin rje brtan ma la sogs so zhes pa ni /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyes pa'i phyir la sogs pa ni gshin rje brtan ma la sogs so zhes pa ni /
translated: The four right efforts are the four:🔽the right effort to prevent nonvirtue that has not yet arisen from arising,🔽and so on.🔽

original: dam tshig gi 'khor lo'i mtshams kyi lha mo rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi 'khor lo'i mtshams kyi lha mo rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: The goddesses of the commitment wheel are the purities of the goddesses in the directions.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba ni ;
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba ni ;
translated: The thirty-seven factors of enlightenment are classified as follows.

original: rdzas su na /
analyzed: rdzas su na /
translated: In terms of substance,

original: de rnams dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga'i gnas skabs kyis bsdus shing 'gyur ba yin te /🔽dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni dran pa'i stobs sam /
analyzed: de rnams dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga'i gnas skabs kyis bsdus shing 'gyur ba yin te / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni dran pa'i stobs sam /
translated: they are included in and transformed by the five faculties and the five powers.

original: dran pa'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: dran pa'i dbang po'o //
translated: The four establishments of mindfulness are the power or faculty of mindfulness.🔽The four right efforts are the power or faculty of diligence.

original: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rnams ni shes rab ba ma brtson 'grus kyi stobs su'o //🔽yang dag par @334a * //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rnams ni shes rab ba ma brtson 'grus kyi stobs su'o // yang dag par @334a * //
translated: The four legs of manifestation are the power of wisdom and the power of diligence.🔽The four limbs of miraculous powers are the power of concentration.🔽The five faculties are the faculty of faith and so on.

original: spong ba rnams ni brtson 'grus su'o //
analyzed: spong ba rnams ni brtson 'grus su'o //
translated: The five powers are the power of faith and so on.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu'o //
translated: The seven limbs of enlightenment are the limb of enlightenment of mindfulness and so on.🔽The eightfold noble path is the noble path of right view and so on.

original: brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni brtson 'grus kyi byang chub kyi yan lag tu'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni brtson 'grus kyi byang chub kyi yan lag tu'o //
translated: The power of vigor is the factor of enlightenment of vigor.

original: shes rab kyi stobs ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa byang chub kyi yan lag tu'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi stobs ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa byang chub kyi yan lag tu'o //
translated: The power of wisdom is the factor of enlightenment of the investigation of phenomena.

original: dran ba'i stobs ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu'o //
analyzed: dran ba'i stobs ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu'o //
translated: The power of mindfulness is the factor of enlightenment of mindfulness.

original: dad pa'i stobs ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu'o //
analyzed: dad pa'i stobs ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu'o //
translated: The power of faith is the factor of enlightenment of effort.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams lam gyi yan lag brgyad du bsdus pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams lam gyi yan lag brgyad du bsdus pa 'di lta ste /
translated: The factors of enlightenment are included in the eightfold noble path as follows:

original: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dag ni dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi byang chub kyi yan lag tu bsdus shing son pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dag ni dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi byang chub kyi yan lag tu bsdus shing son pa'o //
translated: Right mindfulness and right concentration are included in the factor of enlightenment of mindfulness and the factor of enlightenment of concentration.

original: brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni yang dag pa'i rtsol bar ro //
analyzed: brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni yang dag pa'i rtsol bar ro //
translated: The factor of enlightenment of effort is right effort.

original: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni yang dag pa'i lta bar ro //
analyzed: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni yang dag pa'i lta bar ro //
translated: The factor of enlightenment of the investigation of phenomena is right view.

original: yang dag pa'i ngag dang / las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba ste tshul khrims dag pa'i las gsum po dang / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag ba'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ngag dang / las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba ste tshul khrims dag pa'i las gsum po dang / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag ba'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
translated: The three pure actions are right speech, right action and right livelihood.

original: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag lnga rnams las te /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag lnga rnams las te /
translated: The five branches of enlightenment are right view, right thought, right effort, right mindfulness and right concentration.

original: shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste /
analyzed: shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste /
translated: The two branches of enlightenment are the branch of enlightenment of pliancy and the branch of enlightenment of equanimity.

original: yang dag par bsdus na dngos po bcur 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: yang dag par bsdus na dngos po bcur 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: When summarized, they become ten things.

original: de rnams kyang tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi stobs te gsum po rnams su bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: de rnams kyang tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi stobs te gsum po rnams su bsdus pa yin no //
translated: They are also summarized as the three powers of ethics, concentration and wisdom.

original: de la yang dag pa'i ngag dang / las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba ni tshul khrims dag pa'i las yin la /
analyzed: de la yang dag pa'i ngag dang / las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba ni tshul khrims dag pa'i las yin la /
translated: Right speech, right action and right livelihood are the pure actions of ethics.

original: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni tshul khrims dag pa'i las kyi 'bras bu ste tshul khrims kyi phung po'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni tshul khrims dag pa'i las kyi 'bras bu ste tshul khrims kyi phung po'o //
translated: Right effort is the result of the action of pure morality, and is the aggregate of morality.

original: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste bzhi rnams ni shes rab kyi phung po'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste bzhi rnams ni shes rab kyi phung po'o //
translated: Right view, right thought, the enlightenment factor of full awareness, and the enlightenment factor of equanimity, these four are the aggregate of wisdom.

original: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
translated: Right mindfulness and right concentration

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po'o //
translated: are the aggregate of concentration.

original: tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin yang shes rab kyi mthar thug par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin yang shes rab kyi mthar thug par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Morality and concentration are the culmination of wisdom.

original: shes rab @334b kho na chos rnams kyi rtogs pa po'o zhes pa'i rigs pa la'o //
analyzed: shes rab @334b kho na chos rnams kyi rtogs pa po'o zhes pa'i rigs pa la'o //
translated: Wisdom alone is the one who understands the dharmas.

original: de ltar na sum cu rtsa bdun po ni bcu rnams kyis dang / bcu rnams ni gsum gyis dang / gsum rnams ni gcig gis yang dag par bsdus so zhes khong du chud par byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na sum cu rtsa bdun po ni bcu rnams kyis dang / bcu rnams ni gsum gyis dang / gsum rnams ni gcig gis yang dag par bsdus so zhes khong du chud par byas pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the thirty-seven are included in the ten, the ten are included in the three, and the three are included in the one.

original: 'di skad du gsungs pa yin te //
analyzed: 'di skad du gsungs pa yin te //
translated: This is what is said.

original: 'dir sngar gsungs pa'i yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i rnam pa'i rtsa spyi bo la sogs pa nas pus mo'i gnas kyi mthar thug pa dang lte ba'i 'khor lo'i nang gi bzhi ste /
analyzed: 'dir sngar gsungs pa'i yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i rnam pa'i rtsa spyi bo la sogs pa nas pus mo'i gnas kyi mthar thug pa dang lte ba'i 'khor lo'i nang gi bzhi ste /
translated: Here, the channels in the form of the ḍākinīs, which are of the nature of the four correct knowledges, were previously taught to be from the crown and so on down to the knees and the four in the center of the navel cakra.

original: sum cu rtsa bdun te /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa bdun te /
translated: These are the thirty-seven.

original: sgo brgyad po rnams dang / brgyad po'i dbus kyi aa wa dh'u t'i'i rang bzhin gyi lus kyi gnas rnams la yang dag par brten pa'i rtsa dgu dang / dbus kyi rtsa bcu rnams su yang bsdus shing son pa yin la /
analyzed: sgo brgyad po rnams dang / brgyad po'i dbus kyi aa wa dh'u t'i'i rang bzhin gyi lus kyi gnas rnams la yang dag par brten pa'i rtsa dgu dang / dbus kyi rtsa bcu rnams su yang bsdus shing son pa yin la /
translated: The nine channels that are based on the eight doors and the eight doors and the central channel, which is the nature of the body’s places, are included and gathered in the ten central channels.

original: bcu po bcu po de rnams la la n'a la sogs pa gsum du dang / de yang dbus ma'i rtsar ro //
analyzed: bcu po bcu po de rnams la la n'a la sogs pa gsum du dang / de yang dbus ma'i rtsar ro //
translated: These ten groups of ten are in three places, such as the navel, and so forth, and also in the central channel.

original: de ltar na dbus kyi aa wa dh'u t'i ni /
analyzed: de ltar na dbus kyi aa wa dh'u t'i ni /
translated: Thus, the central avadhūtī

original: rdo rje phag mo'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo'i rang bzhin no //
translated: is the nature of Vajravārāhī.

original: de las rtsa'i tshogs thams cad gsal bar 'gyur bas na de kho na la brten par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de las rtsa'i tshogs thams cad gsal bar 'gyur bas na de kho na la brten par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Since all the groups of channels become clear from that, they are based on that alone.

original: 'di rnams kyis ni kun rdzob dang / don dam pa'i dngos po gnyis gsal bar byas pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis ni kun rdzob dang / don dam pa'i dngos po gnyis gsal bar byas pa yin te /
translated: These [channels] clarify the two things, the conventional and the ultimate,

original: de nyid zung 'jug gi lam gsal bar byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid zung 'jug gi lam gsal bar byas pa yin no //
translated: and that clarifies the path of union.

original: ji skad du gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji skad du gsungs pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: ji ltar chu 'dzin du ma ni //
analyzed: ji ltar chu 'dzin du ma ni //
translated: Just as many clouds

original: dbyibs dang kha dog sna tshogs can //
analyzed: dbyibs dang kha dog sna tshogs can //
translated: with various shapes and colors

original: nam mkha'i khongs su byung nas ni //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khongs su byung nas ni //
translated: arise within the realm of space

original: de nyid du ni thim 'gyur ba /
analyzed: de nyid du ni thim 'gyur ba /
translated: and dissolve there itself,

original: de ltar snang ba gsum po yi //
analyzed: de ltar snang ba gsum po yi //
translated: in the same way, the three appearances

original: rgyu can rang bzhin thams cad yin //
analyzed: rgyu can rang bzhin thams cad yin //
translated: have all natures as their cause.

original: yul rnams kun la zhugs nas kyang //
analyzed: yul rnams kun la zhugs nas kyang //
translated: Having entered into all objects,

original: 'od gsal bar ni 'jug par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'od gsal bar ni 'jug par 'gyur //
translated: they enter into clear light.

original: zhes pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs kho na stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid kho na gzugs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir dang / kun rdzob las ni logs shig tu //
analyzed: zhes pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs kho na stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid kho na gzugs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir dang / kun rdzob las ni logs shig tu //
translated: Apart from the conventional,

original: don dam pa ni su zhig smra //🔽zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam pa ni su zhig smra // zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: who would speak of the ultimate?

original: 'di dag gis ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa dag so sor 'byed cing /🔽mngon par zhen pa nyid las /
analyzed: 'di dag gis ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa dag so sor 'byed cing / mngon par zhen pa nyid las /
translated: These passages distinguish the conventional and the ultimate,🔽and🔽they refute the other schools, such as the Vai🔽bhasikas, who assert that the conventional and the ultimate are the same,🔽and they refute the other schools, such as the

original: zhi ba dang / tshangs pa dang / grangs can gyi skyes bu la sogs par smra ba'i gzhan gyi sde pa dang / rnam pa med par khas len zhing smra ba la sogs pa'i rang gi sde pa yang sel bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes pa spros pas @335a * //
analyzed: zhi ba dang / tshangs pa dang / grangs can gyi skyes bu la sogs par smra ba'i gzhan gyi sde pa dang / rnam pa med par khas len zhing smra ba la sogs pa'i rang gi sde pa yang sel bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes pa spros pas @335a * //
translated: Sāṃkhya, who assert that the conventional and the ultimate are different.🔽Enough with this elaboration.

original: chog go // dkyus ma brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: chog go // dkyus ma brjod par bya ste /
translated: I will now explain the main point.

original: de lta / de ltar 'di rnams nang du rtsa'i rang bzhin dang / phyi rol du ni zhal dang sku mdog dang / phyag dang / dbyibs dang / mtshon cha la sogs pa 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: de lta / de ltar 'di rnams nang du rtsa'i rang bzhin dang / phyi rol du ni zhal dang sku mdog dang / phyag dang / dbyibs dang / mtshon cha la sogs pa 'dzin pa ste /
translated: In this way, these are the nature of the channels internally, and externally they are the faces, colors of the body, hands, shapes, weapons, and so on.

original: sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang la brten nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor rnam par gzhag pa dang / pull'i ra la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su /
analyzed: sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang la brten nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor rnam par gzhag pa dang / pull'i ra la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su /
translated: Based on the power of the thoughts of sentient beings, they are arranged as the circle of the mandala and in the places such as Pulliramalaya,

original: zhing skyes ma'i gzugs kyis rjes su 'dzin par mdzad pa rnams rol par byed cing /
analyzed: zhing skyes ma'i gzugs kyis rjes su 'dzin par mdzad pa rnams rol par byed cing /
translated: they take on the forms of the field-born ladies and act as their protectors.🔽They play,

original: dga' bar byed la /
analyzed: dga' bar byed la /
translated: they enjoy themselves,

original: rab tu rgyu bar byed do //
analyzed: rab tu rgyu bar byed do //
translated: and they move about.

original: de bzhin du nang du yang /
analyzed: de bzhin du nang du yang /
translated: In the same way, internally,

original: de rnams kyi zhal la sogs pa yod de /
analyzed: de rnams kyi zhal la sogs pa yod de /
translated: they have faces and so on.

original: rtsa thams cad nyid bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo las byung nas rdo rje dang chu skyes kyi mthar thug pa na zhal du rab tu gsal bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: rtsa thams cad nyid bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo las byung nas rdo rje dang chu skyes kyi mthar thug pa na zhal du rab tu gsal bar 'gyur la /
translated: All the channels arise from the great-bliss wheel and become the faces at the end of the vajra and lotus.

original: de'i myu gu rnams ni so so'i phyogs mang po rnams so //
analyzed: de'i myu gu rnams ni so so'i phyogs mang po rnams so //
translated: Their sprouts are the many individual directions.

original: khams kyis gtsos pa las sku mdog dang ldan pa ste /🔽de ltar yang so dang sen mo ni dkar po dang / skra dang ba spu ni nag po dang / pags pa'i dri ma ni dmar nag dang / sha ni dmar po'i mdog dang / chu rgyus rnams ni dkar po dang / rus pa'i phreng ba ni dkar po dang /🔽mchin pa ni shin tu nag po dang / snying ni dmar dkar dang / mig dag ni dkar po dang / nag po dang / mkhris pa ni ser po dang / glo ba ni dmar po dang / rgyu ma dang gnye ma ni dkar po dang /
analyzed: khams kyis gtsos pa las sku mdog dang ldan pa ste / de ltar yang so dang sen mo ni dkar po dang / skra dang ba spu ni nag po dang / pags pa'i dri ma ni dmar nag dang / sha ni dmar po'i mdog dang / chu rgyus rnams ni dkar po dang / rus pa'i phreng ba ni dkar po dang / mchin pa ni shin tu nag po dang / snying ni dmar dkar dang / mig dag ni dkar po dang / nag po dang / mkhris pa ni ser po dang / glo ba ni dmar po dang / rgyu ma dang gnye ma ni dkar po dang /
translated: The colors of the body are dominated by the elements.🔽The teeth and nails are white, the hair and body hair are black, the skin's dirt is dark red, the flesh is red, the veins are white, the bones are white,🔽the liver is very black, the heart is red and white, the eyes are white and black, the bile is yellow, the lungs are red, the intestines and mesentery are white,

original: lto ba ni sngo bsangs dang / bshang ba ni ser po dang / mtshams mtha' ni dmar dkar dang / bad kan ni dkar po dang / rnag ni zla ba ltar dkar ser dang / khrag ni dmar po dang / rdul ni me'i kha dog dang /
analyzed: lto ba ni sngo bsangs dang / bshang ba ni ser po dang / mtshams mtha' ni dmar dkar dang / bad kan ni dkar po dang / rnag ni zla ba ltar dkar ser dang / khrag ni dmar po dang / rdul ni me'i kha dog dang /
translated: the stomach is bluish, the feces are yellow, the ends of the joints are red and white, the phlegm is white, the pus is white and yellow like the moon, the blood is red, the sweat is the color of fire,

original: tshil bu ni dkar po dang / mchi ma ni mu tig gi 'bras bu ltar dkar ba dang mchil ma ni gnag cing dkar ba dang / ngar snabs ni ser po dang dkar po'o zhes pa ni kha dog gi dbye ba'o //
analyzed: tshil bu ni dkar po dang / mchi ma ni mu tig gi 'bras bu ltar dkar ba dang mchil ma ni gnag cing dkar ba dang / ngar snabs ni ser po dang dkar po'o zhes pa ni kha dog gi dbye ba'o //
translated: The fat is white, the tears are white like pearl-sprouts, the spittle is black and white, and the snot is yellow and white. This is the classification of their colors.

original: 'di rnams kyi dbyibs ni /
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi dbyibs ni /
translated: Their shapes are as follows.

original: 'khyog bo'i gzugs nyid kyis g-yon dang g-yas su rab tu rgyu bas gnas pa ste /
analyzed: 'khyog bo'i gzugs nyid kyis g-yon dang g-yas su rab tu rgyu bas gnas pa ste /
translated: They are located in the left and right sides, moving in a crooked form.

original: g-yas brkyang bal sogs pa'i gzugs su grub pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang bal sogs pa'i gzugs su grub pa'o //
translated: They are formed in the shape of the right leg extended and so forth.

original: mtshon cha 'di rnams kyi gri gug dang thod pa rnam par dag pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma 'byed par byed pa'i lhan skyes kyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: mtshon cha 'di rnams kyi gri gug dang thod pa rnam par dag pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma 'byed par byed pa'i lhan skyes kyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: The purity of these weapons, the flaying knife and skull, should be understood as the innate nature that cuts the stains of conceptual thought.

original: 'dir tshigs su @335b bcad pa /🔽rnam rtog dri ma rnam gcod pa'i //
analyzed: 'dir tshigs su @335b bcad pa / rnam rtog dri ma rnam gcod pa'i //
translated: Here is a verse.🔽The nature of the attainment of the experience of reality

original: yang dag myong ba'i bdag nyid thob //
analyzed: yang dag myong ba'i bdag nyid thob //
translated: is the definite whiteness of the innate,

original: gzung dang 'dzin las nges par grol //
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin las nges par grol //
translated: freed from the grasped and the grasper,🔽cutting the stains of conceptual thought.

original: lhan cig skyes dkar nges pa'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes dkar nges pa'o //
translated: The innate is the supreme bliss,

original: reg ba tsam gyis 'jig rten la //
analyzed: reg ba tsam gyis 'jig rten la //
translated: experienced by mere contact in the world.

original: sangs rgyas 'bras bu nyid sbyin byed //🔽mkha' 'gro ma sogs bcur bshad pa'i //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'bras bu nyid sbyin byed // mkha' 'gro ma sogs bcur bshad pa'i //
translated: And bestows the fruit of buddhahood.🔽The wheel is explained as having ten spokes,

original: 'khor lor son slad rtog pa ni //
analyzed: 'khor lor son slad rtog pa ni //
translated: Such as the dakinis and so forth.🔽The conceptualizations that arise

original: mi phyed la sogs rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: mi phyed la sogs rang bzhin gyis //
translated: From the nature of indivisibility and so forth

original: dus kun du ni 'gro la gnas //
analyzed: dus kun du ni 'gro la gnas //
translated: Abide in beings at all times.

original: khams kyi rang bzhin dpa' bo che //
analyzed: khams kyi rang bzhin dpa' bo che //
translated: The nature of the elements is the great hero,

original: nyi shu rtsa bzhi yang dag ldan //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa bzhi yang dag ldan //
translated: Endowed with the twenty-four.

original: rang lus dbus son rtsa rnams ni //
analyzed: rang lus dbus son rtsa rnams ni //
translated: The channels that abide in the center of one's body

original: dpa' mo yin na gal te 'dir //
analyzed: dpa' mo yin na gal te 'dir //
translated: Are the heroines. If here

original: ji ltar rmongs shing 'khrul bar gyur //
analyzed: ji ltar rmongs shing 'khrul bar gyur //
translated: One is confused and deluded,

original: pull'i ra sogs gnas rigs na //
analyzed: pull'i ra sogs gnas rigs na //
translated: In the places such as Pulliramalaya

original: phyi rol yongs su dor 'gyur te //
analyzed: phyi rol yongs su dor 'gyur te //
translated: And so forth, one will be abandoned externally.

original: sgom pa de ltar 'khrul pa yin //🔽nang gi rnal 'byor ldan pa las //
analyzed: sgom pa de ltar 'khrul pa yin // nang gi rnal 'byor ldan pa las //
translated: Such meditation is delusion.🔽Liberation is attained by yogins

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams thar pa 'thob //🔽zhes pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga dpyid kyi thig le'i rgya cher 'grel pa gsang ba chen po'i sgron ma las//
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams thar pa 'thob // zhes pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga dpyid kyi thig le'i rgya cher 'grel pa gsang ba chen po'i sgron ma las//
translated: From the yoga endowed with the inner.🔽This is the extensive explanation of the seventh chapter in the great commentary on the Spring Time of Wisdom called the Lamp of the Great Secret,

original: rgyas par bstan pa bdun pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: rgyas par bstan pa bdun pa'i rgyas par bshad pa'o /
translated: the method of the completion stage.

original: // / da ni phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor dang / mchod sbyin dan /
analyzed: // / da ni phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor dang / mchod sbyin dan /
translated: Now, the external maṇḍala, the sacrificial pledge, and the🔽offering.

original: bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg la sogs pa nang du gzhag pa de rnams rab tu gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg la sogs pa nang du gzhag pa de rnams rab tu gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to make clear those things that are to be internalized, such as the external maṇḍala, the sacrificial post,

original: de nas gang yang rung zhes bya bal sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas gang yang rung zhes bya bal sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: the recitation, the homa, and so forth, [the Bhagavān] declares, “Then, whatever [is suitable],” and so forth.

original: 'di rnams kyang sngar brjod pa nyid kyi phyir go sla'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyang sngar brjod pa nyid kyi phyir go sla'o //
translated: These are easy to understand because they have been explained previously.

original: de la lus kho na dkyil 'khor du rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: de la lus kho na dkyil 'khor du rtogs par bya ste /
translated: There, the body itself should be realized as the maṇḍala.

original: lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya bar 'brel lo //
analyzed: lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya bar 'brel lo //
translated: It is connected with the “body maṇḍala.”

original: ji lta bu zhen /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhen /
translated: How so?

original: byang chub che zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub che zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares, “great awakening,” and so forth.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag pa rnam par gzhag pa'i rtsa gang yin pa 'di rnams ni rnam pa de nyid kyis ye shes dang / thugs dang gsung dang sku dang dam tshig gi 'khor lor gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams su rnam par gzhag go zhes brten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par dag pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag pa rnam par gzhag pa'i rtsa gang yin pa 'di rnams ni rnam pa de nyid kyis ye shes dang / thugs dang gsung dang sku dang dam tshig gi 'khor lor gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams su rnam par gzhag go zhes brten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par dag pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: These channels, which are the bases for the presentation of the thirty-seven factors of awakening, are presented as the dakinis and so on who abide as the wheels of exalted wisdom, mind, speech, body, and commitment.

original: de su'i rgyu yin zhen /
analyzed: de su'i rgyu yin zhen /
translated: What is the cause of that?🔽It should be said that it is the dakini who is nonconceptual, nonapprehending, and of the nature of unobstructedness.🔽She is the one who moves in space.🔽She is fully designated as the buddha expanse.🔽She is the one who moves in space.

original: 'di ni rnam par rtog pa med cing dmigs pa med pa sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i yin no zhes brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par rtog pa med cing dmigs pa med pa sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i yin no zhes brjod par bya ste /
translated: She is fully designated as the buddha expanse.

original: d'i ni nam mkhar 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: d'i ni nam mkhar 'gro ba ste /
translated: She is the one who moves in space.

original: sangs rgyas dbyings su rab tu brtags //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dbyings su rab tu brtags //
translated: She is fully designated as the buddha expanse.

original: nam mkha' kun rgyu'i @336a * //🔽dngos grub rnams //
analyzed: nam mkha' kun rgyu'i @336a * // dngos grub rnams //
translated: She is the one who moves in space.🔽She is fully designated as the buddha expanse.🔽She is the one who moves in space.🔽She is fully designated as the buddha expanse.🔽She is the one who moves in space.🔽She is fully designated as the buddha expanse.🔽She is the one who moves in space.🔽She is fully designated as the buddha expanse.🔽She is the one who moves in space.🔽She is fully designated as the buddha expanse.🔽She is the one who moves in space.🔽She is fully designated as the buddha expanse.🔽She is the one who moves in space.🔽She is fully designated as the buddha expanse.🔽She is the one who moves in space.🔽She is fully designated as the buddha expanse.🔽She is the one who moves in space.🔽She is fully designated as the buddha expanse.🔽She is the one who moves in space.🔽She is fully designated as the buddha expanse.🔽She is the one who moves in space.

original: mkha' 'gro ma zhes brjod par bya //🔽zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma zhes brjod par bya //🔽zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: She is fully designated as the buddha expanse.

original: ye shes lnga'i nam mkha' chen po la rgyu ba ni rtsa rnams te /
analyzed: ye shes lnga'i nam mkha' chen po la rgyu ba ni rtsa rnams te /
translated: awarenesses.

original: de'i phyir de nyid ni mkha' 'gro ma zhes brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de nyid ni mkha' 'gro ma zhes brjod par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, they should be called “ḍākinīs,”🔽because nonconceptual reality arises for both of them through contact with

original: de la reg pa las gnyis ka la rnam par mi rtog pa'i de kho na nyid 'char ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la reg pa las gnyis ka la rnam par mi rtog pa'i de kho na nyid 'char ba'i phyir ro //
translated: them.

original: brten pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs nas /
analyzed: brten pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs nas /
translated: Having explained the supported maṇḍala,

original: lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pas rten gyi dkyil 'khor gsungs te /
analyzed: lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pas rten gyi dkyil 'khor gsungs te /
translated: the support maṇḍala is explained with “the body maṇḍala” and so forth.

original: de la lus kho na dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: de la lus kho na dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The body itself is the maṇḍala.🔽It is the nature of the channels and constituents of the maṇḍalas of mind,

original: thugs dang gsung dang sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa dang / khams kyi rang bzhin /
analyzed: thugs dang gsung dang sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa dang / khams kyi rang bzhin /
translated: speech, and body,

original: rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo rnams kyi rten nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo rnams kyi rten nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the support of the yoginīs and heroes.

original: de nyid kyi phyir nyams dga' ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir nyams dga' ba ste /
translated: Therefore, it is delightful,

original: phyi rol gyi rdul tshon la sogs pa la ltos pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
